reviews.review: Kalian tau temenku ga? Pantek semua
Super recomendad si te quieres meter varias horas jugando sin darte cuenta
a classic zombie fps game but I suggest left 4 dead 2 instead because it includes left 4 dead 1 stuff actually it includes everything included in this game

I really have enjoyed this every time I come back to it. It is a an enjoyable experience. The companion or bot ai is better then a lot of most games that try to do the same thing. I do like how the mechanics work overall. You can definitely have fun as single player but multiplayer is where both this and its sequel shine.  I played this briefly when it came out and then picked up lfd2 and decided to pick this up again when it was on sale. Even though the second greatly improves on the first this is still not a game to be missed.
SADSDF

Игра, которая захватила моё сердце, игра которая до сих пор держит планку и может потягаться с новыми экшенами, в этой игре есть почти всё, от возможности пойти разными путями и придти к одной точке, до масштабных сражений с кучей зомби. Первая часть зашла на 60ч, эта зайдёт +- точно так-же. Игра одна из самый атмосферных и не надоедливых, из которых я играл.
Графа: 7 из 10 
Сюжетная линия: 9 из 10
Цена: для такой игры, 10 из 10
Вообщем, игра топ, как первая так и вторая часть, до сих пор держит планку

이 게임은 총 4명을 플레이 유형으로 나뉩니다.

1. 고인물 혼자 길 뚫어놓고 혼자 서바이벌 하는 플레이어
2. 길 찾지 못하고 같은 곳만 해매다가 겨우 도움받아 길 찾는 플레이어
3. 그 길 찾지 못하던 사람 도와주는 플레이어
4. 봇

This game will forever be a timeless classic. Great characters, great atmosphere, dialogue, writing, the list goes on. Been a fan since '08 and will always be one of my favorite games. If you haven't played this yet, I highly recommend you do so!

Left 4 Dead is an exciting, breathtaking and fascinating game!

It's a zombie shooter, but one of the best! It's a lot of fun to play, both alone and with friends. The different types of zombies make the game varied, plus there are a lot of missions and maps.

In terms of graphics, L4D is very good, even though it's an old game. The sound is really great and it always goes well with what happened!

I give a clear purchase recommendation and I recommend the game to all zombie shooter fans and collectors!

Classic zombie shooter game. Very fun when going through all the maps for the first time, but their isn't much of an incentive or challenge of replaying them unless you try one of the higher difficulties. Playing this with up to three friends is definitely more enjoyable than trying to complete a map by yourself.
